actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to reduce the rate of postage on certain mail transported between the State of Hawaii and certain Pacific areas.

summary.text: Provides for the reduction in the rate of postage on air parcel post mail transported between the State of Hawaii and specified military areas and territories and possesions of the United States in the Pacific.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to reduce the rate of postage on certain mail transported between the State of Hawaii and certain Pacific areas.
